### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    salary DECIMAL(10,2),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    rating INT,
    comments TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS payroll (
    payroll_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    salary DECIMAL(10,2),
    bonus DECIMAL(10,2),
    paycheck_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE employees SET salary = 60000 WHERE employee_id = 101;

);

);

);

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT, review_date DATE, performance_rating INT, feedback TEXT)

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),

  hire_date DATE,
  salary DECIMAL(10,2)
)

  department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department_name VARCHAR(50),
  manager_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE salaries (
  salary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  salary DECIMAL(10,2),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  reviewer_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE benefits (
  benefit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  benefit_name VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)
